languages.text: "Несомненно, возвращение защитника Простора вселит новые силы и веру в тех, кто выстаивал под ударами врагов Человечества в ваше отсутствие! Слухи о святой реликвии, хранящейся на вашем судне, проникают во все системы Коронуса, вдохновляя и приободряя слабых и утративших надежду".

"Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, возвращение защитника Простора вселит новые силы и веру в тех, кто выстаивал под ударами врагов Человечества в ваше отсутствие! Слухи о святой реликвии, хранящейся на вашем судне, проникают во все системы Коронуса, вдохновляя и приободряя слабых и утративших надежду".

Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

"Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

"Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

languages.text: “您不在的这段时间，科罗努斯扩区遭到了人类之敌的袭击。毫无疑问，科罗努斯扩区守护者的回归，会为人们带来新的力量与信念！关于您船上藏着圣物的传言正传播到科罗努斯扩区的每个星系，鼓舞那些缺乏力量与信仰的人们。”
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

traits.locale_text: “您不在的这段时间，科罗努斯扩区遭到了人类之敌的袭击。毫无疑问，科罗努斯扩区守护者的回归，会为人们带来新的力量与信念！关于您船上藏着圣物的传言正传播到科罗努斯扩区的每个星系，鼓舞那些缺乏力量与信仰的人们。”

languages.text: "Die Rückkehr {mf|des Wächters|der Wächterin} der Koronus-Ausdehnung wird all jenen neue Kraft und neuen Glauben schenken, die in Eurer Abwesenheit die Hiebe der Feinde der Menschheit erdulden mussten! Gerüchte des heiligen Relikts auf Eurem Schiff verbreiten sich in sämtliche Systeme der Ausdehnung und inspirieren und stärken die Schwachen und Hoffnungslosen."
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

traits.locale_text: "Die Rückkehr {mf|des Wächters|der Wächterin} der Koronus-Ausdehnung wird all jenen neue Kraft und neuen Glauben schenken, die in Eurer Abwesenheit die Hiebe der Feinde der Menschheit erdulden mussten! Gerüchte des heiligen Relikts auf Eurem Schiff verbreiten sich in sämtliche Systeme der Ausdehnung und inspirieren und stärken die Schwachen und Hoffnungslosen."

languages.text: « Nul doute que le retour {mf|du protecteur|de la protectrice} des Étendues de Koronus redonnera foi et courage à ceux qui ont tenu bon face aux ennemis de l'humanité en votre absence ! La rumeur selon laquelle vous transporteriez une relique sacrée à bord de votre vaisseau s'est répandue comme une traînée de poudre et est devenue une véritable source d'inspiration pour les faibles et les opprimés. »
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

traits.locale_text: « Nul doute que le retour {mf|du protecteur|de la protectrice} des Étendues de Koronus redonnera foi et courage à ceux qui ont tenu bon face aux ennemis de l'humanité en votre absence ! La rumeur selon laquelle vous transporteriez une relique sacrée à bord de votre vaisseau s'est répandue comme une traînée de poudre et est devenue une véritable source d'inspiration pour les faibles et les opprimés. »

languages.text: «Sin duda, ¡el regreso de{mf|l| la} guardi{mf|án|ana} de la Extensión de Koronus dará nuevas fuerzas y reavivará la fe de quienes han sufrido los embates de los enemigos de la Humanidad durante su ausencia! Los rumores de la sagrada reliquia que guarda su nave ya se propagan por los sistemas de la Extensión, inspirando y dando valor a los débiles y los abandonados».
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda, ¡el regreso de{mf|l| la} guardi{mf|án|ana} de la Extensión de Koronus dará nuevas fuerzas y reavivará la fe de quienes han sufrido los embates de los enemigos de la Humanidad durante su ausencia! Los rumores de la sagrada reliquia que guarda su nave ya se propagan por los sistemas de la Extensión, inspirando y dando valor a los débiles y los abandonados».

languages.text: 「間違いなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスのガーディアンの帰還は、あなたが不在の間、人類の敵の打撃に耐えてきた人々に新たな力と信念を与えるでしょう！あなたの船に保管されている聖遺物の噂は、エクスパンスのすべての星系に広がり、弱者や孤独な人々を鼓舞し、勇気づけています」
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いなく、コロヌス・エクスパンスのガーディアンの帰還は、あなたが不在の間、人類の敵の打撃に耐えてきた人々に新たな力と信念を与えるでしょう！あなたの船に保管されている聖遺物の噂は、エクスパンスのすべての星系に広がり、弱者や孤独な人々を鼓舞し、勇気づけています」

languages.text: "Sizin yokluğunuzda İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı direnenler, şüphesiz Koronus Enginliği'nin muhafızı geri döndü diye kudrete ve imana kavuşacaktır! Geminizde kutsal bir yadigârın bulunduğuna dair söylentiler, Enginlik'in dört yanına yayılmakta. Bu da mazlumlara ve kimsesizlere ümit kaynağı olmakta."
languages.original_text: "Without a doubt, the return of the guardian of the Koronus Expanse will give new strength and faith to those who have stood under the blows of the enemies of Humanity in your absence! Rumours of the holy relic kept aboard your vessel are spreading to every system of the Expanse, inspiring and emboldening the weak and the forlorn."
